body: Part 6 when
If your dick doesnt get hard while reading this, then it's a good shit :')
10/10, good shit, would support the fuck outta the guy if I find his patreon or whatever.

Okay, I read the comments about the possible NTR, as someone who got baited by a lot of NTR out of nowhere in a doujin; lemme tell you this, THERE IS NO WAY THIS WILL TURN INTO AN NTR. First, the fact that Haru willingly have sex with her everytime she wants to, even though he seemed against it, there is no way she'll get horny over another dude thinking "maybe this guy likes doing it with me" no; also she is so madly inlove with Haru???? r u blind? Second, to the people thinking "it's like she's the only one who wants to do it" no, its not that Haru doesn't want to, he's just careful around their parents; put yourself in his shoes, if yours and her parents found out that you two are always having sex, there is an off-chance that they would force a break-up, regardless if they've been childhood friends or not (judging by how close their parents are, and personal experience).  Lastly, the guy hasn't made any NTR doujins, there is no way he'd just make one possibly out of nowhere.

The thing with wholesome vanilla hentai is that it wont leave you pissed off after cumming. Yes the purpose of hentai is to fap to it, but its really great for a hentai to leave you happy albeit for the characters for once

Fingers crossed

body: I NEED MOAR WHERE CAN I FIND MOAR

@flo7 People are saying it's sad because it's pretty obvious that Chinatsu is trying her hardest to appeal to the guy and he's giving her basically nothing. You just feel bad for her. Of course we've probably all been that type of guy ourselves but it doesn't change the fact that he's not being proactive at all. As for NTR? Because apparently some people. for some god forsaken reason, like seeing it which I will never understand. NTR mainly just pisses me off personally.

The part where he said she "looks like a cow" is such a little kid thing to do.  Right when I read the part where he said that it brought back bad memories of when I said something insensitive to a girl when I was younger too.  I mean, fuck, I think you're cool.  Cows are cool.  How is that an insult?  Smh, I couldn't believe I thought life was complicated when I was a kid; because now that I'm in college I now how fucking complicated things can be.  Anyways, back to the topic at hand.  This is a good "manga".  10/10 would cry tears of joy whilst fapping to this wholesome series.

@xjarheadx there are plenty of artists that go from a genre to the other or do both, Takeda Hiromitsu started doing vanilla stuff now he does mostly NTR, some of Distance's first works were kinda NTR now he does mostly harem stuff; but if the question is more if there are examples of an author that decided to change genres in the middle of a series after it was already ongoing for quite some time those must be fewer but I know at least one even if it is kinda a special case, there is a hentai called Pretty Cool that for some reason the author decided to revisit years later but it went from a vanilla story to a NTR I think, I have not seen it translated but that's what it seems unless is a dream or something of that kind.
